column1: #text=I wanted to go to Atlanta to visit my daughter , son-in-law and granddaughter .
#text=I went on-line and searched for the cheapest flights for the weekend on which I wanted to go .
#text=I saw that Frontier Airlines had a really reasonable rate so I purchased a ticket for Friday , March 13th through Sunday , March 15th .
#text=Several hours before my flight was due , I drove to National Airport and parked in the daily-rate lot .
#text=I went into the airport and passed through the security checkpoint , showing the TSA agent my electronic ticket\/boarding pass and my driver 's license .
#text=Once through security I waited at the gate until the plane had landed for my flight .
#text=Once boarding started , I got in line with my boarding pass and entered the plane .
#text=I found my seat , the aisle seat in row 26 , and sat down .
#text=After the safety instructions had been given , the flight taxied to the end of the runway and then took off .
#text=In just a few short hours we had safely touched down at the Atlanta airport where my daughter was waiting for me .
